<h1 align="center">
  Intro to Gatsby Blog Post
</h1>

A demo for a personal blog using Gatsby to import blog posts from the Contentful CMS using Graphql query schema.
Site is deployed using Netlify [View Live Demo](https://gatsby-andrew.netlify.app/).\_
